id,

mapper.update:
update t_order
orderno = #{orderno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
totalprice = #{totalprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_order set orderno = #{orderno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, totalprice = #{totalprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
